document_data.name: Nybor's Mild Admonishment
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nybor's mild admonishment''''' was an [[enchantment]] [[spell]] that inflicted an agonizing pain upon its target, rendering them completely incapacitated.
document_data.Effects: When struck by ''mild admonishment'', a target experienced such intense pain that they were incapable of doing anything but writhe upon the ground in agony. However, some people were capable of completely resisting the spell's effects.
document_data.Usage: Like ''[[Nybor's gentle reminder]]'', this spell was commonly used by slavers, overseers and other [[Red Wizards]] of [[Thay]] who administered over their subjugates.
document_data.Casting: The casting of ''gentle reminder'' required only [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s,
